summary: IT STARTED YESTERDAY MORNING JULY 5TH 2017, AS I WAS DRIVING 45MPH TO WORK MY CAR JUST SHUT OFF WITH NO WARNING.. IT HAPPENED TWICE.. TODAY JULY 6TH ON MY WAY HOME TAKING A RIGHT HAND TURN MY CAR SHUTS OFF AGAIN, NO WARNING.. TRIED STARTING IT WHICH IT STARTED BUT THEN NOTICE THE ENGINE LIGHT WAS ON AND MY OIL LIGHT CAME ON SAYING NEEDS OIL CHANGE.... I STILL HAVE OVER A THOUSAND MILES BEFORE MY NEXT OIL CHANGE IS DUE... LATER THAT DAY I CHECKED MY OIL WHICH WAS GOOD, DIDN'T NEED ANY.. I'M JUST CONFUSED ON WHAT'S GOING ON ESPECIALLY WHEN I JUST PAID $6500 TO PAY THE CAR OFF...
